titleStmt.title: Some thoughts humbly offered to the consideration of the members of the Honourable House of Commons, concerning the credit of the nation.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

notesStmt.note: Concerning a method of financing the current war by a form of credit, so as not to unduly restrict trade.
Imperfect: tightly bound with slight loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
